p: Morphological textures of Cu-PEDOT and Pd/PEDOT were investigated by TEM analysis. The Cu-PEDOT depicted in Fig. 5a shows the three dimensional structure of Cu nanocubes on PEDOT matrix, and Pd nanoparticles are displayed in Fig. 5b. The formation of tiny sphere shaped Pd nanoparticles have the size of 2.8 to 8.5 nm range as depicted in Fig. 5b (inset image). The agglomerated Pd nanoparticles stretch over a length of 200 nm resembling a shrimp and it reveals the homogeneous distribution of Pd NPs on Cu/PEDOT matrix.
